ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Kunark system specs
ygData.msgSnippet: Does connection speed have anything to do with performance?  I recently moved to a neighborhood where the best connection I get is 26.4K (my reason for having
ygData.messageBody:
Does connection speed have anything to do with performance? I recently
moved to a neighborhood where the best connection I get is 26.4K (my reason
for having a cable modem installed next week). Could my connection be the
culprit?

Mujahid

> -----Original Message-----
> From: ligge@... [mailto:ligge@...]
